pages.text: Eukaryotic Mats represent clumped microbial eukaryote colonies that would otherwise not be representable as seperate entities due to their miniscule size. The biota/lifeforms that are represented by this are the Volyn Biota, Protosterol biota, Longfengshania & Houjiashania.
